name: part_000
file: tmp_[#SakuraMiko New 3D Unveiling] Check out the super-elite Miko! [HoloLive⧸SakuraMiko] [T7AkrTQwSjs]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_000.mov

scenes.description: Opening splash screen with the title and stream schedule for Sakura Miko's new 3D unveiling.
Sakura Miko sits on the beach, feeling bored and reflecting on her break.
The God of the Cyber Sakura Shrine appears to Miko, giving her a mission to become a more powered-up elite idol.
A narrator explains the training Miko underwent with God to prepare for her new form.
Miko prepares to transform, gathering her 'idol power' at the beach.
Miko reveals her new 3D model and performs 'Shiny Smily Story' on stage.

subtitles.original:
New Miko 3D Unveiling Ver. 2.0
12/23 21:00
3Dお披露目
subtitles.english:
New Miko 3D Unveiling Ver. 2.0
12/23 21:00
3D Reveal

subtitles.original: あぁ...
subtitles.english: Ahh...

subtitles.original: 今日も暑いね。
subtitles.english: It's hot today too, isn't it?

subtitles.original: 休止してからというもの、毎日は退屈で、
subtitles.english: Ever since I took a break, every day has been boring...

subtitles.original: 早く配信したいな。
subtitles.english: I want to stream again soon.

subtitles.original: こうやって海を眺めるのも飽きてきたで。
subtitles.english: I'm getting tired of just staring at the ocean like this.

subtitles.original: 【？？？】みこさん、お久しぶりです。
subtitles.english: [???] Miko-san, it's been a while.

subtitles.original: おっ。
subtitles.english: Oh.

subtitles.original: あれ、神？
subtitles.english: Is that... God?

subtitles.original: 【神】神です。電脳桜神社の神です。
subtitles.english: [God] I am God. The God of the Cyber Sakura Shrine.

subtitles.original: うわぁ、すっかり忘れてたよ。
subtitles.english: Whoa, I completely forgot about you.

subtitles.original: もう設定というか概念になりかけてたで。
subtitles.english: You were almost becoming just a setting or a concept.

subtitles.original: 【神】設定とか言わないで！！あなたは≪巫女≫なんですから、つかえる神がいるのも当たり前ですよ！
subtitles.english: [God] Don't say it's just a setting!! You're a "Miko," so it's only natural for there to be a god you serve!

subtitles.original: ああ、みこか...
subtitles.english: Ah, a Miko...

subtitles.original: 今はみこ、エリートアイドルとしてホロライブで頑張ってるから、すっかり忘れてたよ。
subtitles.english: Right now, I'm working hard in Hololive as an elite idol, so I completely forgot.

subtitles.original: もうアイドルが本業みたいなもんだわね。
subtitles.english: Being an idol is basically my main job now.

subtitles.original: ところで、なんで久しぶりにこっちに来たの？
subtitles.english: By the way, why did you come here after all this time?

subtitles.original: 【神】みこさんに巫女として、いやエリート巫女アイドルとして…私からある提案というか使命を、言い渡しに来たんです。
subtitles.english: [God] I've come to give you, as a Miko—no, as an elite miko idol—a certain proposal, or rather, a mission.

subtitles.original: それは...
subtitles.english: That is...

subtitles.original: 【神】よりパワーアップしたエリート巫女アイドルの姿になることです！
subtitles.english: [God] To become an even more powered-up version of an elite miko idol!

subtitles.original: それから
subtitles.english: After that,

subtitles.original: みこは神と一緒に、よりパワーアップする為努力をした。
subtitles.english: Miko worked hard together with God to power up.

subtitles.original: 神はさくら神社の繁栄の為、
subtitles.english: God, for the sake of the Sakura Shrine's prosperity,

subtitles.original: みこはもっと、憧れのエリートなアイドルになるため。
subtitles.english: and Miko, to become an even more admired elite idol.

subtitles.original: みこがよりアイドルで活躍して知名度をあげれば桜神社が廃ることはない...
subtitles.english: If Miko succeeds more as an idol and increases her fame, the Sakura Shrine will never fade away...

subtitles.original: （建前）
subtitles.english: (Public Stance)

subtitles.original: そして・・・・
subtitles.english: And then....

subtitles.original: 月日は流れ、今日
subtitles.english: Time passed, and today,

subtitles.original: さらなるエリートへみこはなる！
subtitles.english: Miko will become an even greater elite!

subtitles.original: 昨日のセカンドフェスで、十分にアイドルパワーも溜まった。
subtitles.english: I've accumulated plenty of idol power from yesterday's 2nd Fes.

subtitles.original: 絶対成功してやるで！
subtitles.english: I'm definitely going to succeed!

subtitles.original: みんな！見ててね！みこの新しい姿！
subtitles.english: Everyone! Watch! Miko's new form!

subtitles.original: エリートみこの力、見せたんで！
subtitles.english: I'll show you the power of an elite miko!

subtitles.original: おぉぉぉぉぉぉ！
subtitles.english: Oooooooooh!

subtitles.original: おらぁぁ！
subtitles.english: Oraaaa!

subtitles.original: おなじ未来を見ていたい
subtitles.english: I want to keep watching the same future

subtitles.original: あの夢 手にしたい
subtitles.english: I want to grasp that dream

subtitles.original: それぞれ違った心で
subtitles.english: With our own different hearts

subtitles.original: 走り出そう！
subtitles.english: Let's start running!

subtitles.original: どこ見てもわくわくする場所に芽生えてた
subtitles.english: It was sprouting in a place that's exciting no matter where you look

subtitles.original: この小さな希望に この瞳 奪われた
subtitles.english: This tiny hope stole my eyes

subtitles.original: 不安で揺れる心をうまくチューニングして
subtitles.english: Carefully tuning my heart that wavered with anxiety

subtitles.original: ほんの小さな勇気を振り絞っていたよ
subtitles.english: I was squeezing out just a little bit of courage

subtitles.original: 諦めの文字デリートして進む
subtitles.english: Deleting the word "give up" and moving forward

subtitles.original: 苦しい時も もう私は一人じゃないから
subtitles.english: Because even in painful times, I'm not alone anymore

subtitles.original: だからもっと夢追いかけたい
subtitles.english: So I want to chase my dreams even more

subtitles.original: わくわく止まらない
subtitles.english: The excitement won't stop

subtitles.original: 想像を超えていく世界見せてあげる
subtitles.english: I'll show you a world that goes beyond your imagination

subtitles.original: アクセスしてみたい
subtitles.english: I want to try to access it

subtitles.original: 後悔なんてさせない
subtitles.english: I won't let you have any regrets

subtitles.original: それぞれ違った心で
subtitles.english: With our own different hearts

subtitles.original: 走り出そう！
subtitles.english: Let's start running!
